product.title: Chalfont Tropical Sea Roman Blind
product.description: Cool, crisp and super stylish, this chalfont tropical sea roman blind call to mind white sands and coral-lined shallows, for that instant touch of exotic, tropical chic. The muted teal blue shade of the fabric takes the edge off its vibrant teal colour, allowing you to give you cool, crisp and super stylish, this chalfont tropical sea roman blind call to mind white sands and coral-lined shallows, for that instant touch of exotic, tropical chic.

relproducts.title: Indonesia Tropical Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Give your room a pick-me-up with the bright and breezy indonesia tropical roman blind. Flaunting a floral motif in zesty, invigorating tones, this fully lined cotton blind exudes a distinctly fresh and tropical vibe. When raised via the sidewinder chain, this blind folds up into neat pleats and is a stylish and space saving window covering that is elegant in its simplicity. Product id: db-rom1006 fabric colour: tropical material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

relproducts.title: Toucan Talk Tropical Roman Blind
relproducts.description: These birds seem to be chatting about the latest hat trend. Colourful and fun, this fabric would look great in any bedroom or even living room. relproducts.description: Tropical sunset is a blend of colours that allows you to lose yourself in the moment and celebrate the free artistic expression that brings the design to life. The calming blues and passionate pinks evoke memories of time spent outside in the sun -just what you need to brighten any day. If you want to add a statement piece to the dining room there's no better way to do it than choosing your favourite colour from tropical sunset.

relproducts.title: Toucan Talk Tropical - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Featuring a lively, colourful, and charismatic array of toucans and parrots, the toucan talk tropical is nothing if not fun. The vibrant colour palette is indeed tropical, and the birds look like they could be in deep conversation. Whilst this fun and characterful blind would be ideal for a little one's bedroom or playroom, it's not exclusive to children. Adults will love the sweet illustrations too, so consider using it to breathe some life and vivacity into your kitchen or dining room.
